page.title: 14A nice place to live
page.content: We have written whether we like living in Whitchurch or not.Here is one piece of work about this. Whirchurch is the third place that I have lived in,most of the people who live here are very friendly.They usually say Hello and have a chat when you meet them in the street. The shops are altogether in the centre of the town.The International Store is a kind of small supermarket where you can go when you haven't much food shopping to do.For the big weekly shop we go to Andover. The Hangings is a nice piece of countryside,it is called this because the trees overhang the path you walk on.The countryside around is very peaceful and there's hardly any litter.
